# kCFCoreFoundationVersionNumber_iOS_4_0

**Global Variable**

The Core Foundation framework version in iOS version 4.0.

## Declaration

```swift
var kCFCoreFoundationVersionNumber_iOS_4_0: Double { get }
```

## Constants
